lessons.japanese: 本物のノイローゼの奴がノイローゼだなんて自称するのかね？
lessons.indonesian: Do you think real neurotics really go and call themselves such?

lessons.japanese: 本物のノイローゼの奴がノイローゼだなんて自称するのかね？
lessons.indonesian: Do you think real neurotics really go and call themselves such?

lessons.japanese: ノイローゼになるかと思ったわ。
lessons.indonesian: I thought I was going to have a nervous breakdown.
